content:
# AGH University research infrastructure in one database-- AGH UST 

URL: https://www.agh.edu.pl/en/detail/agh-ust-research-infrastructure-in-one-database
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:22:30

AGH University research infrastructure in one database 

 03-03-2023 

 research and science 
 Excellence Initiative – Research University 

 An online database with the research offer of the AGH University was launched. The system contains information on the university research infrastructure and its capabilities. The project was implemented within the IDUB programme. 

oferta-badawcza.agh.edu.pl

The system was developed in two language versions (Polish and English). It includes all university units, making it a perfect place to can get acquainted with the entire research equipment at the AGH University.

The section called ‘equipment database’ is intended for all users, both university employees and people outside the AGH University community who are interested in using our research infrastructure. On the other hand, the ‘software list’ is an offer directed exclusively at our employees, students, and doctoral students.

To find any piece of equipment, you can browse the database by units, contact persons, and key words.

The equipment database will be constantly updated by authorised users – local administrators, such as deans of faculties or the employees they appoint.

Back
